page.title: 08CHURCHILL SUB-POST OFFICE
page.content: The Post Office is classed as a sub-Post Office. It is in the privately owned house of the Post-Mistress. Opening Hours: Monday-Friday 9am - 5.30pm, Wednesday and Saturday 9am - 1pm. Transactions are: payment of pensions, child benefit, savings bank, national giro, savings certificates, premium bonds, postal orders, postage and insurance stamps. Television licence, dog licence, payment of telephone bills and water rates. 1st class postage stamp 17p. 2nd class letter 13p. TV licence, black and white Â£18, colour Â£58; dog licence 37p. All mail is collected from two mail boxes in the village and taken to Chipping Norton for sorting. Two collections and deliveries Monday - Friday, one of each on Saturday.
